segments.text: Hi , I would like to purchase a one way ticket to Brussels , please .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Certainly sir , this is our train schedule . We have an express train departing every morning and an overnight train that departs at nine pm .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How long does it take to get there ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: About twelve hours . We currently have tickets available only for first class on the express train . If you ’ d like , you can choose a sleeper on the overnight train which is a bit less expensive .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah , I think that is the best option . Do you serve food on the train ? Twelve hours is such a long time !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , of course . There is a dining car towards the front of the train where they serve meals at all times . We do provide complimentary water and coffee for all of our passengers .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Here you are sir . Your train leaves from platform number nine at nine on the dot . Remember to be here at least thirty minutes before your scheduled departure time or else you might miss your train !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I understand . Thank you very much !
segments.speaker: S1
